description: Internet Archive Decentralized Web Ext and WB Ext builder
name: dweb-ext-builder

scripts.postinstall: node download && cpx dist-dweb/dist/scripts/dweb-objects-bundle.js dist-combo/scripts && cpx dist-dweb/dist/scripts/dweb-transports-bundle.js dist-combo/scripts && cpx dist-dweb/dist/scripts/bootloader.js dist-combo/scripts && node changemanifest
scripts.help: echo 'test (test it), webpack (build it), setuphttp (link files for http access);'
